      • login

        @RequestMapping(value="login")
public String login(User user,
                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        登陆请求验证
        参数:
        user - user.getUsername() 包含用户名/邮箱/id
        request - HttpServletRequest
        model - Model
        返回:
        View

      • loginSubmit

        @RequestMapping(value="loginSubmit")
public String loginSubmit(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                               org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        登陆请求验证
        参数:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        登陆时form表单需提交两个参数：username(用户名/邮箱)、password(密码)
        返回:

      • phoneVerifyLogin

        @RequestMapping(value="phoneVerifyLogin")
public String phoneVerifyLogin()
        手机号－验证码方式登陆

      • loginByPhoneAndCode

        @RequestMapping(value="phoneVerifyLoginSubmit")
 @ResponseBody
public BaseVO loginByPhoneAndCode(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        登陆请求验证
        参数:
        phone - 登录的手机号
        code - 发送到手机的验证码
        response - HttpServletRequest
        model - Model
        返回:
        BaseVO

      • sendPhoneLoginCode

        @RequestMapping(value="sendPhoneLoginCode")
 @ResponseBody
public BaseVO sendPhoneLoginCode(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        发送手机号登录的验证码
        参数:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        form表单需提交参数：phone(发送到的手机号)
        返回:
        BaseVO
